channel.title: Why has BitBay trading volume dropped to 0 since April 10?
channel.description: What has happened to BitBay trading volume and is there anywhere to buy or sell BitBay tokens any more?!

item.title: Why has BitBay trading volume dropped to 0 since April 10?
item.dc:creator: @Craig_Claussen
item.description:
@Craig_Claussen wrote:

LATOKEN found an issue with coding the peg protocol into their servers. They have found and fixed the issue, they are testing and will reopen the market for trading asap.

Read full topic
item.source: Why has BitBay trading volume dropped to 0 since April 10?
